current_balance: You have an available balance of
how_to_redeem_text_1:
Step 1. Swipe the card through the reader. If the card is a winner, the word WINNER! will appear.

Step 2. Insert the winning card into the slot that says (Insert Winning Cards)

Step 3. Claim your payment
press_image_view: Press the image to view your prize
no_prize: Your card has not won any prizes
keep_playing: Keep trying, your luck is near
no_stock: There are no more units of this product
use_prize: Use your prize to buy more cards
out_of_service: Machine out of service. Sorry for the inconvenience.
not_enough_money: This machine cannot pay your prize at this time.
already_claimed: This prize has already been claimed.
contact: For any additional information, questions, prize redemption or suggestions, do not hesitate to contact us.
take_prize: Enjoy your prize... we'll see you soon!
